description:
Part A
When Iruma woke up, most of the ruckus was already over. Sullivan tells Iruma that Kiriwo had been arrested. What happened when the giant fireworks went off?
 
Part B
The ordeal at Babyls comes to an end. The Battler Party is finally about to start! The students all do their best in order to get the Grand Prize, and the students’ families come by to enjoy the festivities!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Pick Everything Up
Je ne lâcherai rien / Un moment en famille
Zenbu Hiroitai / Kazoku to no Jikan
أريد أن أصلح كل شيء / وقت العائلة
全部拾いたい / 家族との時間
